name: microCosmik
description:
After your cat, Cosmik has mysteriously zapped into your TV, you go in to find her and discover she's been taken and held captive. You must go behind enemy lines to restore power to the grid and free her!

This is my first complete game. I had the idea to make something simple that I could learn from. This experimental game is a level I designed to practice setting some conditions for the player to meet while being moderately challenged in order to advance in an interactive environment. It isn't very long, but I hope it brings some level of joy to those of you who take the time to play it.

If you play it. Thank you!

P.s. I don't own a PC, so if you play the Windows version, please let me know if it works:)
